level.text: 2940.1 All motions for an award of attorney’s fees shall be filed withinhirty (30) calendar days of service of the final order.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 53 DCR 5674, 5682 (July 14, 2006); asmended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 12541, 12583 (December1, 2010).
